mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_board(notice_board_id, member_id, created_date, subject, content, hit_count, notice) VALUES (seq_notice_board.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, SYSDATE, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_board SET subject = #{subject}, content = #{content},notice = #{notice} WHERE notice_board_id = #{noticeBoardId}
mapper.select: SELECT notice_board_id as noticeBoardId, member_id as memberId, created_date as createdDate, subject, content, hit_count as hitCount, notice FROM notice_board
